data.name: PiwikPROClientID
data.value: A part of your API credentials. You can create it in Menu > Profile > API credentials.

data.name: PiwikPROContainer
data.value:
Enter your Piwik PRO account address with containers added to the address.
For standard domains: https://yourname.containers.piwik.pro For custom domains: https://yourname.piwik.pro/containers
This address may be different for Piwik PRO on-premises or private cloud accounts. Contact us to get the right address.

data.name: PiwikPROSecret
data.value: A part of your API credentials. You can create it in Menu > Profile > API credentials.

data.name: PiwikPROServiceUrl
data.value: The address you use to log in to Piwik PRO. Example: https://yourname.piwik.pro

data.name: SharepointURL_Online
data.value: Example: https://contoso.sharepoint.com

data.name: SharepointURL_OnPrem
data.value: URL to your Sharepoint WebApplication Example: https://yoursharepointwebapp.com

data.name: SPActivateStapplerFeature
data.value: If you want to activate feature tracking of all newly created site collections, it activates only feature of tracker (which add custom action to settings menu which name “Piwik PRO") but not the tracking. Activation of tracking is inside "Piwik PRO" settings form.

data.name: SPAdminLogin_Online
data.value: A global admin account on your SharePoint tenant. Example: admin@contoso.onmicrosoft.com

data.name: SPAdminLogin_OnPrem
data.value: A farm admin account. Example: domain\username

data.name: SPOnline_AzureLocation
data.value: By default, the resource group is created in the West Europe region or inherits the existing location. You can use a custom location. Example: westeurope, uswest.

data.name: SPOnline_AzureResourceGroup
data.value: The name of a new or existing resource group.

data.name: SPOnline_AzureSubscription
data.value: Azure subscription name or resource group ID.

data.name: SPOnline_AzureTenant
data.value: Azure tenant name or resource group ID.

data.name: SPOnline_AzureWebAppSuffix
data.value: A suffix added to the web app name. Example: piwikpro<webAppSuffix>. The suffix needs to be globally unique in Microsoft Azure. You can use your company’s name. You can use letters and numbers.

data.name: SPOnline_IncludeAzure
data.value:
For a standard installation, keep this option enabled. We'll install the WebJob on your Azure tenant. The WebJob connects Piwik PRO to SharePoint and registers new site collections that can be tracked.
If this option is disabled, you'll need to register new site collections manually in Piwik PRO.

data.name: SPOnline_IncludeSP
data.value: This option could be disabled if you want to install only Azure part and there is already installed Piwik PRO connector on your Sharepoint tenant.

data.name: SPOnline_PiwikPROSiteID
data.value: It's a unique ID for each site or app in Piwik PRO. You can find it in Menu > Administration > Sites & apps > Pick a site or app. The ID is under the site or app name.

data.name: SPOnline_UseSiteScope
data.value: If checked, the SPFx package will be installed in the site collection app catalog (not in the tenant app catalog) and available only for the site collection specified in SharePointUrl. To install more site collections, rerun this script with a different SharePointUrl.

data.name: SPOnline_UseWebLogin
data.value: Keep it checked if you use multi-factor authentication for your SharePoint account.

data.name: SPSecondAdminLogin_Online
data.value: Optional - secondary admin account, will be added to sitecollection administrators in newly created PiwikAdmin site. This admin will be able to access the form of configuration Piwik PRO Sharepoint connector. f.e. admin2@contoso.onmicrosoft.com

data.name: SPSecondAdminLogin_OnPrem
data.value: Optional - secondary admin account, will be added to sitecollection administrators in newly created PiwikAdmin site. This admin will be able to access the form of configuration Piwik PRO Sharepoint connector. in format: domain\username
